desc: Changes the print cursor position used by [print()](print.md) in the grid variant.
note: The positions are on a characters grid, the size of the grid can be requested from [termSize()](termSize.md)

args.name: x
args.desc: The X coord of the cursor in characters, defaults to the current X coord.

args.name: y
args.desc: The Y corrd of the cursor in characters, defaults to the current Y coord.

args.name: bgcolor
args.desc: The background color used when printing (**-1**,**15**), **-1** means no background, defaults to the current background color.

rets.name: x
rets.desc: The current X coord of the cursor in characters.

rets.name: y
rets.desc: The current Y corrd of the cursor in characters.
